NEW FEATURE: Internet connectivity monitoring and offline mode indication
Added real-time connectivity status display in the application header and status bar
Automatic blocking of network operations when offline to prevent errors and improve user experience
Connectivity checks now happen before update checks, issue reporting, and other network operations
Visual indicators show üåê Online or üìµ Offline status with clear tooltips
